AccountLogic.summary: A class that allows you to interact with accounts in the repository.

Create.summary: Adds a new account to the repository, encrypts the fields marked as Encrypted.

ReadAll.summary: Returns a list of all accounts in the vault.
ReadAll.returns: A list of accounts without fields.

Read.summary: Returns the account by id, tries to decrypt the fields marked as Encrypted.
Read.param: Password for decrypting fields, if null - decryption will not be performed. Null by default.

Update.summary: Modifies the account data in the storage, encrypts the fields marked as Encrypted.

Delete.param: Id of the account to delete.

UserLogic.summary: A class that allows you to interact with user data required to connect to the cloud.

Set.summary: Installs data to connect to the cloud and stores it in storage, encrypts fields marked as Encrypted.

Get.summary: Returns data for connecting to the cloud, tries to decrypt fields marked as Encrypted.
Get.param: Password for decrypting fields, if null - decryption will not be performed. Null by default.
Get.returns: Data for connecting to the cloud.

ContextInitializer.summary: The class responsible for initializing the storage context and verifying the storage password.

Initialize.summary: Initializes the context and tries to load data from storage.
